analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/45/0x6410429abec5a90186ce42773f98498463f870de.sol:
	Contract KenagaCoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/45/0x6410429abec5a90186ce42773f98498463f870de.sol#218)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/45/0x6410429abec5a90186ce42773f98498463f870de.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
